original_title: 巨根伝説 美しき謎
overview: Shinohara, a young bodybuilder, joins a para-military sect in northern Japan.  His instructor, Takizawa, takes a liking to the new recruit.  After an early “special” training session the two develop a lasting and loving relationship. “Beautiful Mystery” was the first gay “adult” film to come out of Japan. Although tame by U.S. standards, it is ground–breaking nonetheless.
title: Beautiful Mystery
